<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 70 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 79</row>

**Price** 14,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

---

This potent poison consists of crystals whose flavor and appearance mimics edible salt but whose effects are deadly; victims experience periods of waking nightmares that overload the senses and eventually result in death through a combination of shock and exhaustion.

**Saving Throw** DC 43 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 hour; **Maximum Duration** 5 days; **Stage 1** [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) once every 1d4 hours, plus [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) (1 day); **Stage 2** [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1 minute once every 1d4 hours, plus frightened 3 and fatigued (1 day); **Stage 3** frightened 3, plus confused for 1d4 minutes, once every hour, plus fatigued (1 day); **Stage 4** death
